page.title: 15RECREATION
page.content: A large recreation ground in Meonstoke provides a beautiful setting for matches played by the Football Club and Cricket Club. Badminton is played almost every day in The Meon Hall which is situated on the recreation ground. Yoga and Keep Fit classes are well attended. Horse riding is very popular.Several families have a pony and support the local Pony Club. The Merrie Stud and Exton Stud provide lessons and hacking facilities. A number of villagers ride with the Hambledon and Hursley Hunt. On the purchase of a licence, local people (many children) enjoy fishing for trout in The Meon River.
